resources.string: %s left, proceed on a course of %s
You can stop navigation completely or pause it until next application start
Press Back once more to quit
Your places will appear here. You can create place by entering its coordinates or by long pressing Places button.
You can stop recording to save the track or pause it to resume on next application start
Track was not saved: too short period of time
Track was not saved: too small distance passed
Your recorded tracks will appear here.
You can also import GPX and KML files.
File is saved in application folder.
Trekarta requests to %s to be able to access the file you want to open
It looks like application has crashed during last run. You will greatly help by sending crash report to the developer.
Advices will be shown from the very beginning
Failed to get coordinates from string
Failed to get some of coordinates
Your installed custom tile maps will appear here.
Data source will be permanently deleted from storage. This action can not be undone.
Native data sources can not be deleted
Native format stores all available data and is extremely compact and fast but is recognized only by Trekarta.
GPX format preserves essential data and is widely used but resulting files are very large. KML format does not preserve time related data but resulting files are 30% more compact then GPX files.

You can enter coordinates in a number of supported formats including UTM and MGRS. If format is recognized coordinates are highlighted with blue color, otherwise they become red. You can enter several coordinates at once provided they are on separate lines. If you write something in a line after coordinates it will be used as a point name. Some examples:

 · 49.29918 -19.24788
 · 49.29918° 19.24788°
 · N 49.29918 E 19.24788
 · W 49°29.918' S 19°24.788'
 · N 49°29'04" E 19°24'43"
 · 49.29918 N, 19.24788 E
 · 49°29'21" N 19°24'38" E
 · 49 29 51, 19 24 18
 · 49 29.4 19 24.5
 · E 49 29, N 19 24
 · N 49° 29, W 19° 24
 · N 49 29.918; E 19 15.88
 · 15N 363936 4328605
 · 15SUD 639 286
 · 15SUD6393628605
For better experience, download detailed world map (%s). You can do it now or later at any time.
An error occurred while reading detailed maps, database was reset
An error occurred while reading hillshades, database was reset
Please wait while maps database is updated for full text search. Depending on how many map areas you have downloaded so far it can take up to several minutes.
If you are enjoying Trekarta please rate it and leave comment on the Google Play Store to boost its spread

Grey squares designate areas available for download. When map index is downloaded each square contains information about area map size and data age. If you check hillshades box then information about availability of hillshades for that area is also displayed and sizes are adjusted to incorporate hillshades. Bright green areas denote active (downloaded) areas, dark green are being currently downloaded. If update for specific area is available, square is yellow. If there is an update for world map special check box will appear. To mark active area for removal long press it. If area is removed space is freed not immediately, but gradually upon time. Map index is updated not more then once a day.
Lightweight offline vector maps contain detailed topological data with elevation contours and support hillshades.
You can add custom maps to cover your area of interest. Custom maps will be shaded as well.
Places can be easily imported from GPX and KML files or
can be created within application. You can navigate to points and share them with others.

You can record tracks of your journey. Just press a button when you start and press it once more when you finish. You can quit the application if you do not need to look at the map, the track will be recorded in the background.
Unpaved, dirt, winter and ice roads are specially visualized. 4wd only roads have specific marking. Fords are displayed on all roads, even primary.
Hiking activity mode emphasises paths and tracks. It visualizes path difficulty and visibility and shows hiking routes.
Skiing activity mode displays clean winter map with mostly all skiing activities: downhill, nordic, hiking and touring. As a bonus freestyle snow-boarding, skating and sleighing areas are displayed.
Now piste grooming, illumination and purpose are depicted on winter map.
When you update imported data source only relevant data is saved, all unsupported properties will be lost
Sunrise and sunset time are local to their corresponding location
You can add more gauges by long pressing gauge panel
You can quickly return to remembered zoom by triple tapping the map
Press location button to enable real time positioning
You can long press maps button to access extra map settings
You can quickly create place in current map position by long pressing Places button

Press Record button to start track recording, during recording press it to see current track statistics or to stop recording. You can close application during recording, the track will be recorded in background.
Long press Record button to access your recorded tracks
Press right arrow button to position map on corresponding item
Press coordinates to cycle through different formats

You can lock place coordinates to prevent accidental dragging of it\'s marker. All places that come from external sources are considered precisely positioned and are locked by default while places that you create on map are treated as approximate and are initially unlocked.
You can shortly clear all data from map by holding volume up button
You can shortly lock map position by holding volume down button to prevent undesirable map movement when depressing finger
Type amenity name in any supported or native language, optionally you can type raw coordinates. If search term is too broad results will be limited to 200 found objects.
You can load as many areas as you wish but having too many active areas significantly degrades performance of map rendering and full text search. Please consider removing unnecessary areas.
You can specify at which level of map detail specific amenity kind will be shown or you can completely hide it from map

Trekarta is designed for hiking, geocaching, off-roading, cycling, boating and all other outdoor activities. It uses offline maps so you do not need to have internet connection. You can easily import places and tracks from GPX and KML data formats or create places in application and share them to others. It lets you write the track of your journey, even in background, so you will never get lost and be able later see where you\'ve been.
Allows the app to read Trekarta user data files such as places and tracks.
Allows the app to add or replace Trekarta user data files such as places and tracks.
Allows the app to get current location from Trekarta.
Allows the app to read Trekarta user preferences.
Allows app to get map data from Trekarta.
Allows app to put data on Trekarta map.
Allows the app to add entries to Trekarta menu.
